title: I think my account was hacked, I also am unable to see my ticket progress, it just disappears
body:
I was playing Leagues today and I got signed off saying I had logged on elsewhere. When I went to change my password I noticed my email address was changed. Now when I submit tickets nothing happens its as if the disappear ive been waiting for 15 minutes and nothing has changed.

If anyone could help that would be awesome!

replies.body: I also never received and email saying that there was a request to change my email. Now i cannot change my email back to the correct one because it is sending an email to the person who stole my account
what is the typical wait time? I have been waiting for three days with no progress. I have sent every rp purchase that i have every made (i saved all the emails.)

Account recovery tickets are done **entirely** via email from your end, so you won't be able to log into the Riot Support site to check on the progress of a ticket you've submitted. You'll receive a reply in your email inbox once we reach back out to you.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
When I click on the link i was sent from riot it says the page i am looking for does not exist
